summary: Two men and two women enjoy a pleasant Sunday at the beach amid the unending toil of the working week.
cast: Erwin Splettstößer|Brigitte Borchert|Wolfgang von Waltershausen|Christl Ehlers|Annie Schreyer|Kurt Gerron|Valeska Gert|Heinrich Gretler|Moriz Seeler|Ernö Verebes
director: Directors: Robert Siodmak, Edgar G. Ulmer | 3 more credits »
title: Los hombres del domingo
